activities: CustomInsight, LLC, a Nevada company, enables customers to create and administer online surveys, including but not limited to, 360 degree feedback surveys and employee engagement surveys. Data are collected and stored, but only made available to the account holder. All information collected is kept confidential and secure, and is not shared with any third-parties.
